#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

bool isPalindrome(long n){
    int length=0,temp=n;
    while(temp>0){
        temp/=10;
        length++;
    }

    int A[length];
    for(int i=0;i<length;i++){
        A[i]=n%10;
        n/=10;
    }

    for(int i=0;i<length/2;i++)
        if(A[i]!=A[length-1-i])
        return false;
    return true;
}

int reverse(long n){
    int ans=0;
    while(n>0){
        ans*=10;
        ans+=n%10;
        n/=10;
    }
    return ans;
}

int main(){
    int t;cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        long n,count=0;cin>>n;
        while(!isPalindrome(n)){
            n+=reverse(n);
            count++;
        }
        cout<<count<<" "<<n<<endl;
    }
}
